judge: Pitch, Rhythm, Voice modulation, overall impact of the song (Song selection, stage presence etc.)
elimination: Comprises of two rounds: prelims(2minute) and final(3-3.5minute).
No backing vocals are allowed. General Rules.
Songs must be in Hindi/English.
Rap portions or refrains are not permissible.
Allowed to play an accompanying instrument themselves or can take the help of their friend.
The decision of the judges shall be final and binding.
Obscenity (at the discretion of judges) of any kind is not allowed and will lead to immediate disqualification.
Time limit should be strictly followed. Participants will be heavily penalized by judges for not doing so.
The decision of the organizers regarding the final line-up would be final.

judge: Coordination among team members, overall performance, stage presence, audience appeal.
rules: Time limit: 10 minutes (including sound check)
Maximum two accompanists are allowed.
The language must be only English and/or Hindi.
The team may sing more than one song within the time limit.
Time limit should be strictly followed. Participants will be heavily penalized by judges for not doing so.
The decision of the organizers regarding the final line-up would be final.
elimination: Participation: There should not be any common members.
There will be only one round.

judge: Choreography & Expressions during the performance, Clarity and Overall impact.
rules: Time Limit: 5 minutes
Styles: All except Folk dance such as Garba, Bhangra, Bihu, etc.
No usage of props is allowed for this round.
Participants will not be judged based on their costumes
The soundtrack should be submitted in the respective google forms shared by the coordinators and to be brought in a pen drive (in .mp3 format only).
The decision of the organisers regarding the final line-up would be final.
elimination: Any kind of fluid, flame, powders, glitters, heavy or sharp objects or any material which has the possibility of tampering/damaging the stage is STRICTLY not allowed.
Vulgarity and obscenity at any point are strictly not allowed. It can lead to immediate disqualification. Songs should be chosen accordingly.
Violation of any of the above rules will lead to heavy penalties.
Time limit should be strictly followed. Participants will be heavily penalized by judges for not doing so.

judge: Choreography & Energy, Creativity & Synchronisation, Expressions, Costumes (Basic colour code), Overall Impact

The decision of the organisers regarding the final line-up would be final.

judge: Choreography & Energy, Creativity & Synchronisation, Expressions, Costumes(Basic color code), Overall Impact
rules: Time Limit: 3- 5 minutes ( +1 minute setup and clearance time)
Teams must perform any sequence of their choice on a song of their choice.
Only one team per college is allowed to perform.
Participants can use more than one song in their performance.
The soundtrack should be submitted in the respective google forms shared by the coordinators and to be brought in a pen drive (in .mp3 format only).

event_name: Thread mill – Inter University Fashion Show
judge: Theme (vivid illusion), Formation (team only), Music, Dresses & Walk, Overall Impact.
rules: Time Limit: 10 minutes (5 minute + 5 minute setup)
There will be only one round
Colleges are expected to bring with them, all the apparels, props and music CDs/ pen drives according to their respective themes, necessary for the event.
All teams should report for the prelim, as no direct entry to the Final event would be allowed.
The slot for the prelims is 10 minutes, including 5 minutes of setup time and 5 minutes of performance time.
Teams would be selected on the basis of their performance in the prelims to walk on the ramp in the main event.
The slot for the final event is 15 minutes’ maximum, which includes 3 minutes of setup time as well.
The soundtrack should be submitted in the respective google forms shared by the coordinators and to be brought in a pen drive (in .mp3 format only).
Time limit should be strictly followed. Participants will be heavily penalized by judges for not doing so.
The decision of the organizers regarding the final line-up would be final

event_name: Haute Couture- Intra University Fashion Show
judge: Talent expertise, Uniqueness & Personality, Crowd Reaction, Overall Impact
rules: Rounds: 3 (Ethnic , Formal And Urban Wear)
Tracks to be played in the background.
Incase of any technical issues, the participant would be allowed to perform the entire performance from the beginning.
Under no condition (other than technical issues) would the participant be allowed to stop and start the performance again.
The final scoring would be based on equal weightage of all the rounds
Time limit should be strictly followed. Participants will be heavily penalized by judges for not doing so.
The decision of the organizers regarding the final line-up would be final
elimination: Vulgarity and obscenity at any point are strictly not allowed. It can lead to immediate disqualification.
Use of cigarettes, alcohol and unfair means is strongly prohibited.

judge: Coordination among team members, overall performance, stage presence, audience appeal.
rules: Participation: There should not be any common members.
There will be only one round.
Time limit: 15 minutes, 5(Set Up)+ 10(Performance).
Maximum two accompanists are allowed.
The language must be only English and/or Hindi.
The team may sing more than one song within the time limit.
The decision of the organisers regarding the final line-up would be final
elimination: Time limit should be strictly followed. Participants will be heavily penalised by judges for not doing so.

judge: Talent expertise, Uniqueness, Personality, Crowd Reaction, Overall Impact
rules: Rounds: 2 (Talent and Personality)
Time Limit: 2-3 Minutes for Talent Round and less than 2 minutes for Personality round.
This event will consist of 2 rounds, the first round will be the talent display round.
The second round will be a personality round where the participant would be asked a question or asked to speak about a topic for less than 2 minutes.
The soundtrack should be submitted in the respective google forms shared by the coordinators and to be brought in a pen drive (in .mp3 format only).
Incase of any technical issues, the participant would be allowed to perform the entire performance from the beginning.
Under no condition (other than technical issues) would the participant be allowed to stop and start the performance again.
The final scoring would be based on equal weightage of both the rounds. ➔Talent round: 50 points ➔Personality round: 50 points
Time limit should be strictly followed. Participants will be heavily penalized by judges for not doing so.
The decision of the organizers regarding the final line-up would be final.

judge: Diction, Clarity of Words, Wit (Creativity, rhyme, etc.), Overall Impact (Attitude, Stage Presence, etc.)
rules: Comprises of two rounds: prelims and final
Participants will have a performance of 2 minute.
The participants are free to play any beat of their choice
The language of rap must be only English and/or Hindi.
The participant is allowed to use puns, double entendres and quips, but any sort of racist, sexist or offensive slurs will lead to immediate disqualification
Time limit should be strictly followed. Participants will be heavily penalized by judges for not doing so.
The decision of the organizers regarding the final line-up would be final.
elimination: Profanity, swears and sexual slangs (at the judge’s discretion) in the rap are not permitted. Else the participant shall be immediately disqualified.

judge: Talent expertise, Uniqueness, Personality, Crowd Reaction, Overall Impact.
rules: Time Limit: 10minutes (5 minute + 5minute setup)
